short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A striking image of a brave and curious cat dressed as a pilot.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browser into an adventurous journey with the 'Feline Aviator Adventure' theme! The warm, glowing lights and rugged details give a sense of thrilling exploration and daring missions. Perfect for cat lovers and adventurers alike, this theme will bring an air of excitement and whimsy to your browsing experience.

Key features:
- Beautiful cat pilot background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather forecast icon.
- Real-time  clock on display
